You tried to read the sign.
But you're standing on the wrong side!

184625.<pc>は 看板を読んだ。\nしかし こちらからは 裏側だった！\n<end>:
You tried to read the sign.
But you're standing on the wrong side!
<end>

→ Frontier Guard Post
← No trespassing due to ongoing investigation

185270.<left>←辺境警備隊詰所\n<right>エテーネ王国領→\n<center:
← Frontier Guard Post
→ Ethene Kingdom Area
↓ Lethe Lake

185349.<left>←王都キィンベル\n<right>ラウラリエの丘・残響の海蝕洞→:
← Royal City Kimbel
→ Lauralie Hill/Echoing Sea Cave

185356.<right>エテーネ王国領→\n<left>←星落ちる谷・自由人の集落:
→ Ethene Kingdom Area
← Starfall Valley/Freedom Village

185358.<center>この先 マデ神殿\n<center>封鎖中のため 立ち入り禁止。:
Made Temple ahead
       No trespassing due to blockade.

187160.食事を作る当番や 掃除をする当番の\n予定表が 貼られている。<br>\nどうや:
The schedule for meal preparation and cleaning duty is posted on the wall.
Apparently, the security guards are in charge of the chores at the station on a rotating basis.

187161.<center>－ 今期の任務達成目標 －<br>\n<left>近年 魔物数の:
－ Targets for this term －
In recent years, there has been a noticeable increase in the number of demons. In order to eliminate the root of the problem, each of you
must find and destroy at least five demon nests. You are the elite chosen to prevent any threat to the Royal City Kimbel. Keep this in
mind as you go about your duties.

190931.ゆっくりと回転する 巨大な装置の中で\n不思議な色の かがやく液体が\n規則正し:
In the huge, slowly rotating device, a strange
colored glowing liquid seems to be ticking
away time.

190932.深夜時間帯の錬金は 錬金釜の作動音が\n近隣住民の眠りをさまたげるため 控えまし:
Please refrain from alchemy at night as the
sound may disturb the sleep of the neighbors.
～ Royal City Alchemists Guild

190933.指針書への反抗は 罪悪の一種です！\n定められた未来は あなたを幸せに導きます。:
Rebellion against the guiding principles is a
form of sin! A predetermined future will lead
you to happiness. Accept everything as it is.

190934.ようこそ 栄光のエテーネ王国へ！\n時の指針書に記された旅人を 歓迎します。\n:
Welcome to Ethene Kingdom! We welcome the
traveler whose name is written in the Time
Guidebook. May the Goddess bless you.

190935.時の指針書に従わぬ者を 発見した場合\n国王の権限において すべからく処罰する。:
Anyone found disobeying the Time Guidebook
shall be punished by authority of the King.
～ Guideline Supervisor Belma

190936.錬金術師メルクルの店 経営理念\n王都キィンベルの 生活に寄りそい\n新しい価値:
Merkul the alchemist's shop is dedicated to
discovering new values and refining the
beautiful culture of the Royal City Kimbel.

190937.錬金術師ガンダックの店 経営理念\n偉大なる祖先が築きあげた エテーネ王国の\n:
Gandak the Alchemist's Shop is dedicated to
refining the progress, development, and glory
of Ethene Kingdom, as built by our ancestors.

190938.錬金術師 ゼフの店\n日用品から魔法生物まで 困った時は\n当店へ お気軽に ご:
Zef the Alchemist's Shop. Please feel free to
contact us if you have any questions from
daily necessities to magical creatures.

190939.大きな鐘が 設置されている。\n詰所の者たちに 危険を知らせたり\n合図を送るの:
There is a large bell.
It seemed to be used to warn and signal the
people in the camp of danger.

190940.錬金釜の中で 得体のしれない物が\nぐつぐつ 煮えたぎっている……。:
There is something unidentifiable simmering
in the alchemy pot...

190941.扉は かたく 閉ざされている。\nするどいツメで ひっかいたようなキズあとが\n:
The door is locked tight!
There were multiple scratches on the door, as
if it had been scratched with sharp claws.

190942.王立アルケミアの 入館記録だ。\n最後の欄に ヨンゲ所長の名が記されている。:
It's a record of entry to the Royal Alchemia.
Director Yong's name is listed in the last
column.

190943.誰かの 時の指針書だ。\n<pc>は 最後のページを読んだ。<br>\nこの日:
It's a guidebook for someone else's time. You read the last page.
On this day, you will accomplish a feat that will remain in the history of Royal Alchemia. You should go about your duties with pride in
your heart.

190944.時の指針書が 落ちている。\n<pc>は 中身を読んだ。<br>\n最後のページ:
The Time Guidebook has fallen down. You read the contents.
On the last page there was a scrawled sentence in the owner's handwriting.
Why can't I use the transporter gate! Neither the attack of the black beast nor the inability to use the transporter gate are
mentioned in the guidebook! I can't believe the Guidebook is useless at a critical moment! This has never happened to me before in my
life!

190945.時の指針書が 落ちている。\n<pc>は 中身を読んだ。<br>\nいかなる 非:
The Time Guidebook has fallen down. You read the contents.
Never stop the production line in any emergency situation.
Don't forget to be grateful. Thank you for your work. A heart of gratitude makes life better.

190946.ヨンゲ所長の 業務日誌のようだ。\n<pc>は 中身を読んだ。<br>\n○月×:
It looks like Director Yong's work diary. You read its contents.
Date: ○/×. Advanced research area expansion was complete. The next day, I started alchemizing Gog types.
Date: ○/□. Gog type alchemy is finished. It's a shame to leave all this equipment lying around, so I'll consider alchemizing a Gog
type developmental enhancement.
Date: ○/△. After spending the whole day at the Ethene Royal Palace, I went straight home.

190947.肖像画の下の プレートには\n『第３８代 王立アルケミア所長 ワグミカ』\nと:
On the plaque below the portrait,
"38th Director of the Royal Alchemia, Wagmika"
is written.

190948.肖像画の下の プレートには\n『第３９代 王立アルケミア所長 ヨンゲ』\nと 書:
On the plaque below the portrait,
"39th Director of the Royal Alchemia, Yong"
is written.

190949.肖像画の下の プレートには\n『初代 王立アルケミア所長 ケミルムング』\nと:
On the plaque below the portrait,
"1st Director of the Royal Alchemia,
Kemirmung" is written.

190950.高度に発達した 錬金術の装置のようだ。\nシリンダー状の 水槽の中に\n得体のし:
It's like a highly developed alchemical
device. The cylinder-shaped tank is home to an
unidentifiable organism.

190951.高度に発達した 錬金術の装置のようだ。\nシリンダー状の 水槽の中に\n得体のし:
It's like a highly developed alchemical
device. The cylinder-shaped tank is home to an
unidentifiable organism.

190978.生まれたばかりの 子供のものとおぼしき\nちいさめのベッドだ。:
It's a small bed that looks like it belongs to
a newborn child.

190979.子供用の びっくり箱だ。\n箱の中の人形が 飛びだしたままだ。:
It's a jack-in-the-box for children.
The doll in the box is still popping out.

190980.おもちゃの荷車が 放置されている。\n部屋を出る直前まで あそんでいたかのようだ:
There is a toy wagon left abandoned.
It was as if they had been playing just before
they left the room.

190981.シャンデリアの残骸が 階段をふさいでいる。\n２階へ行くのは ムリそうだ……。:
The broken chandelier is blocking the stairs.
It's not possible to go to the second floor.

190982.シャンデリアの残骸が 階段をふさいでいる。\n１階へ降りるのは ムリそうだ……。:
The broken chandelier is blocking the stairs.
It's not possible to go down to the first
floor.

190983.開きっぱなしの 育児日誌が置いてある。\n<pc>は 中身を読んだ。<br>\n:
There's a parenting journal left open. You read the contents.
Month ○ Day ×. Today my baby called me mama. It may have been my ears, but that's what it sounded like to me.
Month ○ Day △. The baby's crawling has improved. If I look away for a moment, I find her in unexpected places, and it can be quite
scary. The other day, she tried to reach for the fire in the stove, so I rushed to move her away. From now on, I have to watch her
carefully......

190984.パドレという人物の 日記のようだ。\n<pc>は 中身を読んだ。<br>\nあの:
It seems to be the diary of a man named Padre. You read the contents.
In a drunken stupor that day, my father mentioned that he wanted me to inherit the throne, not my brother......
Since then, my brother has completely shut down. We had never been close brothers, but not to the point that we could not speak to
each other. It may be impossible to repair the relationship, but I hope he can at least come and see my newborn child.

190985.扉を ふさぐようにして 家具が置いてある。\nこれ以上 進めそうにない。:
There is furniture blocking the door.
It seems like you can't proceed any further.

190988.極刑に使用された 黄金の釜だ。\n生物を黄金に変える機能を そなえているが\n今:
It's a golden cauldron used for execution.
It has the ability to turn living things into
gold, but it seems to be deactivated now.

190989.鉄格子の扉には カギが かかっている。\n脱獄は できないようだ。:
The barred door is locked.
There seems to be no way to escape.

191132.動力炉内の動力球の光が 明滅を始めたら\n交換の合図です。光が 完全に消える前に:
When the light of the Power Orb in the power furnace starts to flicker, it's a sign to replace it.
Put in a new Power Orb before it goes out completely.

191318.極刑に使用された 黄金の釜だ。\n生物を黄金に変える機能を そなえているが\n今:
It's a golden cauldron used for execution.
It has the ability to turn living things into
gold, but it seems to be deactivated now.

191319.動力炉内の動力球の光が 明滅を始めたら\n交換の合図です。光が 完全に消える前に:
When the light of the Power Orb in the power furnace starts to flicker, it's a sign to replace it.
Put in a new Power Orb before it goes out completely.

191320.巨大な 暖炉がある。\nなんとなく 自分が\n小さくなってしまったように 感じる:
There is a huge fireplace.
You feel as if you've become smaller somehow.

191321.<pc>の背丈よりも 大きい本棚だ。\n本も大きくて 手に取れそうにない。:
The bookshelf is bigger than you are tall.
The books are so big that you can't pick them up.

191322.巨大な イスがある。\n<pc>がよじのぼるには 苦労しそうだ。:
There is a huge chair.
It's seems like you would have a hard time
climbing up it.

191323.巨大な棚の上に 燭台がのっている。\n<pc>には 燭台に触ることは\nできそう:
There's a candlestick on a huge shelf.
It is unlikely that you will be able to touch
the candlestick.

191597.とても大きな花瓶が 飾られている。\n活けられた花は みずみずしく 美しい。:
A very large vase of flowers is on display.
The flowers in the arrangement were fresh and
beautiful.

191598.かわいらしい クマのぬいぐるみが 置いてある。\nどうやら とても古いもののよう:
There's a cute bear plushie on the floor.
It appears to be very old.

191599.チェス盤がある。\nしかし コマがないので\nチェスで遊ぶことは できなかった！:
There is a chessboard.
But you couldn't play chess because you don't
have any pieces!

191600.暖炉の火が ごうごうと 燃えさかっている。: The fire in the fireplace was roaring.

191601.テーブルの上には\nおいしそうなフルーツが のっている。: There is delicious looking fruit on the table.

191602.とても大きな花瓶が 飾られている。\n活けられた花は みずみずしく 美しい。:
A very large vase of flowers is on display.
The flowers in the arrangement were fresh and
beautiful.

191603.色とりどりの花が かざられた花瓶だ。: It is a vase with colorful flowers in it.

191605.チェス盤がある。\nしかし コマがないので\nチェスで遊ぶことは できなかった！:
There is a chessboard.
But you couldn't play chess because you don't
have any pieces!

193005.<center>ようこそ 不死の魔王城へ<br>\n<left>勇者アルヴァンさ:
Welcome to the Demon King Castle
Thank you, Hero Alvan and Ally Kamil, for coming all the way to the castle of the Immortal Demon King.
First of all, I, the General Gladiator Troll, the steward of Immortal Demon King Nerodos, will guide you on your journey of death.
When you are ready to leave this world, please ascend the stairs and go to the door at the end to meet me. Hmph.

193006.<center>勝利のお祝い<br>\n<left>よもや 勇者と盟友ふぜいが\:
Congratulations on Your Victory
To think that the Hero and his ally would actually defeat me... Let us celebrate your victory.
The hospitality you've received is but a taste of what's to come. We, the Twelve Tyrants, await you through the door ahead. Gahaha...

193007.<center>最後のご忠告<br>\n<left>なんと 魔軍十二将すらも 打:
Final Words of Advice
How dare you defeat even the Twelve Tyrants! You must be quite proud of your strength.
However, in the inner throne room lies Nerodos, the Immortal Demon King. No one has yet to surpass his power.
All that awaits you beyond this door is a cruel defeat. If this is too frightening, there is a teleportal you may use. Gahaha...

193008.神速なる 遊撃隊長\n暴将黒竜丸の像<br>\n不死のチカラにより\n暴将黒竜丸:
Statue of swift squad leader Tyrant Equinox.
When Tyrant Equinox is revived by the power of immortality, the statue will regain its original form.

193009.勇壮なる 支援隊長\n楽将バトルシェイカの像<br>\n不死のチカラにより\n楽:
Statue of heroic support commander Music General Maracaraider.
When Music General Maracaraider is revived by the power of immortality, the statue will regain its original form.

193010.狡猾なる 奇兵隊長\n幻将ハヌマーンの像<br>\n不死のチカラにより\n幻将ハ:
Statue of cunning oddball captain General Nemean.
When General Nemean is revived by the power of immortality, the statue will regain its original form.

193011.豪放なる 特選軍隊長\n凶将バリクナジャの像<br>\n不死のチカラにより\n凶:
Statue of largehearted special-ops commander General Togrus Maximus.
When General Togrus Maximus is revived by the power of immortality, the statue will regain its original form.

193012.勇猛なる 獣魔軍隊長\n獣将キングレオの像<br>\n不死のチカラにより\n獣将:
Statue of valiant beastmaster commander General Marquis de Leon.
When General Marquis de Leon is revived by the power of immortality, the statue will regain its original form.

193013.冷酷なる 参謀総長\n知将ジャミラスの像<br>\n不死のチカラにより\n知将ジ:
Statue of ruthless chief of staff, Jamirus the Strategic.
When Jamirus the Strategic is revived by the power of immortality, the statue will regain its original form.

193014.忠実なる 侍従長\n邪将トロルバッコスの像<br>\n不死のチカラにより\n邪将:
Statue of loyal grand chamberlain General Gladiator Troll.
When General Gladiator Troll is revived by the power of immortality, the statue will regain its original form.

193015.凶暴なる 滅殺隊長\n猛将ギーグハンマーの像<br>\n不死のチカラにより\n猛:
Statue of ferocious annihilation commander General Giga Clubber.
When General Giga Clubber is revived by the power of immortality, the statue will regain its original form.

193016.豪壮なる 巨人隊長\n巨将アトラスの像<br>\n不死のチカラにより\n巨将アト:
Statue of magnificent giant commander Giant General Atlas.
When Giant General Atlas is revived by the power of immortality, the statue will regain its original form.

193017.邪悪なる 暗殺隊長\n妖将バズズの像<br>\n不死のチカラにより\n妖将バズズ:
Statue of wicked assassination commander General Pazuzu.
When General Pazuzu is revived by the power of immortality, the statue will regain its original form.

193018.非道なる 悪魔軍隊長\n獄将ベリアルの像<br>\n不死のチカラにより\n獄将ベ:
Statue of unjust devil trooper Prison General Belial.
When Prison General Belial is revived by the power of immortality, the statue will regain its original form.

193019.凄絶なる 竜軍隊長\n竜将ドラゴンガイアの像<br>\n不死のチカラにより\n竜:
Statue of fierce dragon commander General Gaia Dragon.
When General Gaia Dragon is revived by the power of immortality, the statue will regain its original form.

→ Ethene Kingdom Area
← Starfall Valley/Freedom Village

Made Temple ahead

207926.<left>←辺境警備隊詰所\n<right>エテーネ王国領→\n<center:
← Frontier Guard Post
→ Ethene Kingdom Area
↓ Lethe Lake

207927.錬金釜の中で 得体のしれない物が\nぐつぐつ 煮えたぎっている……。:
There is something unidentifiable simmering
in the alchemy pot...

207928.大きな鐘が 設置されている。\n詰所の者たちに 危険を知らせたり\n合図を送るの:
There is a large bell.
It seemed to be used to warn and signal the
people in the camp of danger.

207929.食事を作る当番や 掃除をする当番の\n予定表が 貼られている。<br>\nどうや:
The schedule for meal preparation and cleaning duty is posted on the wall.
Apparently, the security guards are in charge of the chores at the station on a rotating basis.

207930.<center>－ 今期の任務達成目標 －<br>\n<left>近年 魔物数の:
－ Targets for this term －
In recent years, there has been a noticeable increase in the number of demons. In order to eliminate the root of the problem, each of you
must find and destroy at least five demon nests. You are the elite chosen to prevent any threat to the Royal City Kimbel. Keep this in
mind as you go about your duties.

207931.生まれたばかりの 子供のものとおぼしき\nちいさめのベッドだ。:
It's a small bed that looks like it belongs to
a newborn child.

207932.子供用の びっくり箱だ。\n箱の中の人形が 飛びだしたままだ。:
It's a jack-in-the-box for children.
The doll in the box is still popping out.

207933.子供用の おもちゃの荷車だ。: It's a toy wagon for children.

207934.シャンデリアの残骸が 階段をふさいでいる。\n２階へ行くのは ムリそうだ……。:
The broken chandelier is blocking the stairs.
It's not possible to go to the second floor.

207935.シャンデリアの残骸が 階段をふさいでいる。\n１階へ降りるのは ムリそうだ……。:
The broken chandelier is blocking the stairs.
It's not possible to go down to the first
floor.

207936.開きっぱなしの 育児日誌が置いてある。\n<pc>は 中身を読んだ。<br>\n:
There's a parenting journal left open. You read the contents.
Month ○ Day ×. Today my baby called me mama. It may have been my ears, but that's what it sounded like to me.
Month ○ Day △. The baby's crawling has improved. If I look away for a moment, I find her in unexpected places, and it can be quite
scary. The other day, she tried to reach for the fire in the stove, so I rushed to move her away. From now on, I have to watch her
carefully......

207937.パドレという人物の 日記のようだ。\n<pc>は 中身を読んだ。<br>\nあの:
It seems to be the diary of a man named Padre. You read the contents.
In a drunken stupor that day, my father mentioned that he wanted me to inherit the throne, not my brother......
Since then, my brother has completely shut down. We had never been close brothers, but not to the point that we could not speak to
each other. It may be impossible to repair the relationship, but I hope he can at least come and see my newborn child.

207938.扉を ふさぐようにして 家具が置いてある。\nこれ以上 進めそうにない。:
There is furniture blocking the door.
It seems like you can't proceed any further.

207940.暖炉の火が ごうごうと 燃えさかっている。: The fire in the fireplace was roaring.

207941.テーブルの上には\nおいしそうなフルーツが のっている。: There is delicious looking fruit on the table.

207942.とても大きな花瓶が 飾られている。\n活けられた花は みずみずしく 美しい。:
A very large vase of flowers is on display.
The flowers in the arrangement were fresh and
beautiful.

207943.色とりどりの花が かざられた花瓶だ。: It is a vase with colorful flowers in it.

207945.チェス盤がある。\nしかし コマがないので\nチェスで遊ぶことは できなかった！:
There is a chessboard.
But you couldn't play chess because you don't
have any pieces!

207946.とても大きな花瓶が 飾られている。\n活けられた花は みずみずしく 美しい。:
A very large vase of flowers is on display.
The flowers in the arrangement were fresh and
beautiful.

207947.動力炉内の動力球の光が 明滅を始めたら\n交換の合図です。光が 完全に消える前に:
When the light of the Power Orb in the power furnace starts to flicker, it's a sign to replace it.
Put in a new Power Orb before it goes out completely.

207948.かわいらしい クマのぬいぐるみが 置いてある。\nどうやら とても古いもののよう:
There's a cute bear plushie on the floor.
It appears to be very old.

207949.チェス盤がある。\nしかし コマがないので\nチェスで遊ぶことは できなかった！:
There is a chessboard.
But you couldn't play chess because you don't
have any pieces!

207950.極刑に使用された 黄金の釜だ。\n生物を黄金に変える機能を そなえているが\n今:
It's a golden cauldron used for execution.
It has the ability to turn living things into
gold, but it seems to be deactivated now.

207951.鉄格子の扉には カギが かかっている。\n脱獄は できないようだ。:
The barred door is locked.
There seems to be no way to escape.

207952.永久時環が ゆっくりと回転している……。\n時渡りのチカラを 使い果たしたので\:
The perpetual time ring is slowly rotating....
The power of time travel has been exhausted,
so the device is empty.

207953.未来を担う 見習い錬金術師 募集中！\n新しい自分を 始めてみませんか？\n:
We're looking for apprentice alchemists for
the future! Would you like to start a new you?
～ Royal City Alchemists Guild

207954.貼り紙が 乱暴に はがされた跡がある。\n「オンディアヌ もう二度と 君を忘れな:
A piece of the bulletin board has been roughly
torn off. "Ondian, I will never forget you."
was carved in the corner with a knife.

207955.ようこそ 錬金術の都 エテーネ王国へ！\nわたしたちは 旅人を歓迎します。\nあ:
Welcome to Ethene Kingdom, city of alchemy!
We welcome you, traveler. May the Goddess
bless you with everlasting happiness.

207956.ここは 王都のみなさんの いこいの広場です。\nマナーを守って 大切に使ってくだ:
This is a recreational area for everyone in
the Royal City. Please use with care. Let's
make it a fun and beautiful place forever.

207957.錬金術師メルクルの店 経営理念\n王都キィンベルの 生活に寄りそい\n新しい価値:
Merkul the alchemist's shop is dedicated to
discovering new values and refining the
beautiful culture of the Royal City Kimbel.

207958.錬金術師ガンダックの店 経営理念\n偉大なる祖先が築きあげた エテーネ王国の\n:
Gandak the Alchemist's Shop is dedicated to
refining the progress, development, and glory
of Ethene Kingdom, as built by our ancestors.

207959.錬金術師 ゼフの店\n日用品から魔法生物まで 困った時は\n当店へ お気軽に ご:
Zef the Alchemist's Shop. Please feel free to
contact us if you have any questions from
daily necessities to magical creatures.

209011.ひどく 古びているが\nかわいらしい表紙の日記帳が 置いてある。\n最後のページ:
There is a diary with a very old but cute cover. On the last page was written the following.
My sweet, sweet baby! May your life be the most wonderful and the happiest it can be!

211278.<left>現在のアトラクションは『クイズ』です！\n<left>整理券の配布は:
The current attraction is "Quiz"!
Numbered tickets will be distributed here.
Please line up in order during congestion.

211279.<center>『おみやげ 販売所』\n<center>完売 次回入荷 未定:
"Souvenir Shop"
  Sold out. Next shipment to be determined.

211280.<left>館内 走るな！\n<left>ドルボード厳禁！:
No running in the museum!
Dolboard strictly prohibited!

211281.<left>この先 療養区画\n<left>許可のない市民 立入禁止:
Medical area ahead.
Off-limits to Unauthorized Citizens.

211284.<center>ようこそ！\n<center>宇宙で一番幸福な町 アルウェーンの:
Welcome!
  To Alweyn, happiest town in the universe!
             The entrance is just up ahead.

211285.<center>この先 凶悪な魔物が 増加中\n<center>進む場合は 慎重:
Increase of vicious monsters ahead.
            Proceed with caution.

211287.<left>これは 様々な困難を 乗り越えるため\n皆のために 尽力した功績を称:
This is a statue of Mr. Raguas, made in honor of his efforts to help everyone overcome various difficulties.
However, this statue, which has long been a symbol of Alweyn, has been ordered to be destroyed by Eternal Manager, Mr. Pukulas.
But the statue of Mr. Raguas, who was a great contributor to Alweyn, could not be neglected, so it was secretly brought to this small island.
I hope that one day this statue will return to Alweyn Town.

211288.<left>この先 立入禁止区画\n<left>用なき者は 近寄らぬこと:
No trespassing zone ahead.
Stay away if you have no business here.

211290.<left>この先 研究区画\n<left>関係者以外 立入禁止:
Research Area ahead
No entry except by authorized personnel.

212073.<center>― 船内案内 ―<br>\n<center>正面にある 花のよう:
― On-board Information ―
The building in front that looks like a flower is Alweyn Town as seen from above. The area is surrounded by a natural heritage reserve.

212074.何か 難しい式が 表示されている。: There's a complicated formula on the screen.

212915.<center>花壇は 踏み荒らさないでね！\n<right>管理 アルウェーン:
Don't trample the flower beds!
～ Management, Alweyn Nature Conservancy

212919.<center>ー通達ー\n<center>ドルボードによる 衝突事故 多発中\:
ー Notice ー
        Dolboard collisions are common.
        Restricted driving in the lab.

214687.<center>『アルウェーン特製 お菓子』\n<center>ひとり ひとつま:
"Alweyn's Special Sweets"
             Only one per person.
    Free for anyone who joins the service!

214689.<center>ゴミは ちゃんと ゴミ箱へ！: Put your trash in the trash can!

214691.<center>きれいな水で\n<center>身も心も きれいに！:
Clean Water
         Cleanse your body and soul!

214707.<center>ー プクランドの自然 ー<br>\n<left>別名 花の民とも:
ー Nature of Pukuland ー
The Pukulipo people, also known as the Flower People, live on a beautiful continent surrounded by flowers and greenery as their name implies.
Here you will find rare flowers and plants unique to the continent of Pukland. Specimens of indigenous monsters are on display.

214709.<center>ー プクランドの文化 ー<br>\n<left>笑いと 芸を愛し:
ー Culture of Pukuland ー
The Pukulipo people, with their love of laughter and art, brought a variety of cultures and customs to Pukuland.
In this section, we will introduce some of them along with the exhibits.

215132.<center>！ 取扱い注意 ！\nアストルティア博物館 収蔵品\n次回 展示:
! Handle with care !
Please keep this in a safe place until it is
displayed in the Astoltia Museum again.

215134.<pc>が モニターに触れると\n画面に『大いなる目覚め・１』が 表示された。<:
When you touched the monitor, "The Great Awakening 1" appeared on the screen.
Using my authority as a duplicate of the Eternal Manager, I entered the restricted area, but found no way to fix the equipment
malfunction in the cold room. Instead, I found a cell sample of Multiplying Beast Biologog that provided the inspiration for the design
of the infinite power reactor in the restricted area. Eternal Manager Pukulas is physically weak. If I can harness the
multiplying power of the beast's cells, Pukulas might be able to get healthy. While I'm looking for a way to repair the cold room, I'll try it on my body, which has the same
spirit structure, and if I'm successful, I'll perform the procedure on Pukulas.

215136.<pc>が モニターに触れると\n画面に『大いなる目覚め・２』が 表示された。<:
When you touched the monitor, "The Great Awakening 2" appeared on the screen.
The cells of the Multiplying Beast Biologog are great. I have more power than a mere duplicate, and more intelligence than even
Pukulas. Now I can easily repair the cold room without having to look up the data...... but I'll have to wait a while before I can wake up
Pukulas. I want to use the power of the beast's cells to help my people. To allow duplicates to live without transformation...

215138.<pc>が モニターに触れると\n画面に『大いなる目覚め・３』が 表示された。<:
When you touched the monitor, "The Great Awakening 3" appeared on the screen.
The Creator first created the Infinite Power Reactor, the light of the world...... and then created the world itself, Alweyn. Finally, he
created us duplicates to serve the primitive Pukulipo species in this new world. But the cold room malfunctioned, and as a result, I
gained the power of a demon beast and learned the truth about the world. The Creator did not create us to serve a primitive species. The
cold room's malfunction was fate. It was the Creator's way of waking me up. We duplicates are the new masters of Alweyn. Pukulas will
sleep eternally, and we will rule Alweyn. ......for that is what the Creator desires.

215140.<pc>が モニターに触れると\n画面いっぱいに 謎の文字列が 表示された。<b:
When you touched the monitor, a mysterious string of characters filled the screen.
E-yis, aneu dish cubrey E-yis, aneu dish cubrey E-yis, aneu dish cubrey E-yis, aneu dish cubrey....

215142.ひどく 古びているが\nかわいらしい表紙の日記帳が 置いてある。\n最後のページ:
There is a diary with a very old but cute cover. On the last page was written the following.
My sweet, sweet baby! May your life be the most wonderful and the happiest it can be!

215209.<center>開封された手紙が 置いてある……。\nどうやら パドレに宛てた:
There's an open letter on the table...... It appears to be addressed to Padre. You read the letter.
ー To my old friend, Padre. ー
I have finally managed to drive the shadow of the plague from Linjahar. I owe it all to the jewel you brought me. Therefore, I have
decided to hold a banquet soon to celebrate the restoration. I would like to invite you, a man of merit, to attend. Let's drink the night
away for the first time in a long time. By the way, I heard that you and your wife had a long-awaited baby. I can't wait to meet you.
I'll be waiting for you and your family in the land of memories, Linjahar. ～ Your loyal friend, Linjara

216166.<center>↑模型展示ゾーン\n<left>←文化展示ゾーン:
↑ Model Exibit Zone
← Culture Exibit Zone

229099.なんらかの 錬金術の装置のようだ。\nプレートには『ヘルゲゴーグ・発展強化型』と:
It seems to be some kind of alchemical device.
On the plaque, "Helgegog Developmental
Enhancement" is written.

238036.極刑に使用された 黄金の釜だ。\nこれ以上 魔物は出てこないようだ。:
It's a golden cauldron used for execution.
It seems that no more demons will come out.

247739.<if_woman>マローネ夫人に宛てられた 手紙だ。\n<pc>は 手紙を読ん:
It's a letter address to Miss Marone. began to read it.
How are things faring? It's been several months since that day, and I can't believe how fast time has flown by.
The young missyoung master probably has no idea what happened to their father, being just born and all.
However, no matter how long it takes, I will fulfill the promise I made to herhim. All I ask is to just be patient for a little longer.

318311.王家の 立派な棺だ。\n棺の中身は 空っぽのようだ。:
It's a splendid coffin of the royal family.
The coffin appears to be empty.
